spec_data.Name: ghc-enclosed-exceptions
spec_data.Description:
Catching all exceptions raised within an enclosed computation, while remaining
responsive to (external) asynchronous exceptions. For more information on the
technique, please see:
<https://www.fpcomplete.com/user/snoyberg/general-haskell/exceptions/catching-all-exceptions>.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 03 Aug 2017 12:15:48 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Catch exceptions within an enclosed computation
